Terminal.WelcomeMessage: Welcome to Amorim. Type 'help' for commands
Terminal.Help: Commands are: help, clear, about, skills, projects, education, experience, contact, resume, social, interests, achievements, blog, recommendations, FAQ, stats, connect, portfolio, feedback, hire, funfact
Terminal.About: I am a passionate individual with a strong interest in technology.
Terminal.Skills: I have proficiency in several programming languages, including JavaScript, Python, and Java.
Terminal.Projects: I have worked on numerous projects, ranging from web development to machine learning applications.
Terminal.Education: I hold a degree in Software Engineering from Fiap University.
Terminal.Experience: I have 4 year of experience working as a software developer.
Terminal.Contact: You can reach me via email at gabriel@amorim.pro.
Terminal.Resume: You can download my resume from the following link: [resume_link].
Terminal.Social: You can connect with me on LinkedIn, Twitter, and GitHub.
Terminal.Interests: Apart from technology, I enjoy traveling, photography, and playing musical instruments.
Terminal.Achievements: I have received several awards for my contributions to projects and initiatives.
Terminal.Blog: You can read my latest blog posts on [blog_link].
Terminal.Recommendations: Here are some testimonials from my colleagues: [testimonial_1], [testimonial_2].
Terminal.FAQ: Here are some frequently asked questions along with their answers: [FAQs].
Terminal.Stats: I have completed [number_of_projects] projects and have [years_of_experience] years of experience.
Terminal.Portfolio: You can view my portfolio at https://amorim.pro.
Terminal.Feedback: Your feedback is valuable to me. Please feel free to share your thoughts.
Terminal.Hire: I am available for freelance opportunities. Let's discuss how I can help with your project.
Terminal.Funfact: Did you know that I once climbed Mount Everest? (Just kidding!)

Terminal.About: Soy una persona apasionada con un gran interés en la tecnología.
Terminal.Skills: Tengo experiencia en varios lenguajes de programación, incluyendo JavaScript, Python y Java.
Terminal.Projects: He trabajado en numerosos proyectos, desde desarrollo web hasta aplicaciones de aprendizaje automático.

Terminal.Experience: Tengo 4 años de experiencia trabajando como desarrollador de software.

Terminal.Resume: Puedes descargar mi currículum desde el siguiente enlace: [resume_link].
Terminal.Social: Puedes conectar conmigo en LinkedIn, Twitter y GitHub.
Terminal.Interests: Además de la tecnología, disfruto viajar, la fotografía y tocar instrumentos musicales.
